main.name: Barunes Padhy
main.bio: I am a Full Stack Engineer specializing in ReactJS and Python to develop my webpages. I am also highly skilled at algorithms and their implementation for reaching an optimal solution. Currently I am working as a Data Analyst at Cervello India.

work.title: Data Analyst
work.description: Responsibilities: Working with Azure Databricks to manage delta tables and debugging the SQL scripts incase of any issues. Creating, running and debugging pipelines on the Azure Data Factory. Using SQL extract data from SAP HANA database. Using Azure Analysis Services along with PowerBI to analyze data

work.title: Front-end Developer
work.description: Responsible for building and deploying a website for an NGO named "Wings of Change".

portfolio.title: PseudoForms: An open-source data colecting platform (ReactJS & Django)
portfolio.description: Created an open source data collecting platform which can be deployed on any server easily and used to collect data. This project is aimed mostly for companies/organisations/research professionals who want to host their own data collecting platform instead of using public services like Google Forms or Survey Monkey. The platform features a unique feature of template form creation unlike any other platform seen before which can aid in much faster form creation.

portfolio.title: PseudoPad: An open-source IDE for C++, by C++
portfolio.description: Created an IDE using Qt and C++ which can be used to compile C++ files. It also features multiple tab support, line numbers and syntax highlighting.
portfolio.category: An open-source IDE for C++ by C++

portfolio.title: Sudo-Assemble: Image recognition project (Tensorflow & CNN)
portfolio.description: Integrated a machine learning algorithm into a website which can be used to recognise various computer hardware peripherals. A guide on how I achieved this using Tensorflow GPU has been documented on the github page of the project.
